person.persName: Marshall R. Stone (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Matilda Stone. Married to Mary Newland Stone in Bath County on August 18, 1853. Father of Fantley/Phaley Stone, Artemesia Stone, and William D. Stone. Resident of Bath County in 1850. Household owned thirteen enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860.
